A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: This was an absolute travesty. Anyone involved in the creative direction of this series should be held accountable for this mindless piece of garbage that was put on screen. They need to fire everyone involved especially those in charge at Lucas Film. \n\nMore importantly everyone should go to Mark Hamill's Twitter or FB and give him praise for their treatment of Luke Skywalker\, no wonder he was so upset with the direction of the film. I'm done with the Disney version of SW\, I'm sticking to what I grew up with since 1977\, THE ORIGINAL  TRILOGY.
